'''Yu''' is an [[NPC]] who can be found in [[Dihua Marsh]], [[Liyue]]. He is friends with [[Mengmeng]] but, because of his father's illness and his subsequent taking over of their shop, no longer has the time to play with her.

{{Dialogue start}}
